name: Plant Hero
description: Plant Hero is a project carried out during one week in a team. During this project I had the role of UX/UI designer. The objective was simple: to promote the project from the Kickstarter website and make it attractive. To this end, my mission was to reassure users about the quality and usefulness of the product in question.

other.content: The purpose of the site is therefore to show the benefits and prove the necessity of the product. For this reason I chose to ask the graphic designer to make illustrations of the product to try to get into the friendly and cool side that the brand puts forward. And therefore have a playful and reassuring side that can create a purchase of the product.

The choice of colors is essential in an interface. It is through this that we can transcribe the identity of a brand and therefore recognize it at first glance. On this project I based myself on the product's graphic charter while extending the range of colors.

It was the first time I had to create a mobile version of a site. It is an exercise in which I found a real interest and where I saw the utility and importance of making mock-ups in a mobile version. I was able to understand the restrictions and require of a mobile version that I didn't know until then.
